content:
Hello, I'm new to zulip so excuse me if I get some things wrong.
I opened this issue on rust-analyzer and while I was writing the PR to close it, I came across 3 more bugs related to the IncorrectCase diagnostic.
Should I just edit my original issue to encompass the issues?
Or should I open 3 more issues for each of the bugs? To me, that feels like it would be spamming the repo. Or maybe I'm just overthinking it here?
I was overthinking it. Ignore this topic.
